sentences.sContent: We hope these regions will embrace democratic reforms.
sentences.sCn: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.sContent: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.sCn: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

words.tran: 拥抱，包含（embrace的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to eagerly accept a new idea, opinion, religion etc
